00001 package com.placesandplaces;
00002 
00003 import java.util.List;
00004 
00005 import android.content.Intent;
00006 import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
00007 import android.os.Bundle;
00008 import android.util.Log;
00009 
00010 import com.google.android.maps.GeoPoint;
00011 import com.google.android.maps.MapActivity;
00012 import com.google.android.maps.MapController;
00013 import com.google.android.maps.MapView;
00014 import com.google.android.maps.Overlay;
00015 import com.google.android.maps.OverlayItem;
00016 import com.placesandplaces.R;
00017 
00018 public class PlacesMapActivity extends MapActivity {
00019         // Nearest places
00020         PlacesList nearPlaces;
00021 
00022         // Map view
00023         MapView mapView;
00024 
00025         // Map overlay items
00026         List<Overlay> mapOverlays;
00027 
00028         AddItemizedOverlay itemizedOverlay;
00029 
00030         GeoPoint geoPoint;
00031         // Map controllers
00032         MapController mc;
00033 
00034         double latitude;
00035         double longitude;
00036         OverlayItem overlayitem;
00037 
00038         @Override
00039         public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
00040                 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
00041                 setContentView(R.layout.map_places);
00042 
00043                 // Getting intent data
00044                 Intent i = getIntent();
00045 
00046                 // Users current geo location
00047                 String user_latitude = i.getStringExtra("user_latitude");
00048                 String user_longitude = i.getStringExtra("user_longitude");
00049 
00050                 // Nearplaces list
00051                 nearPlaces = (PlacesList) i.getSerializableExtra("near_places");
00052 
00053                 mapView = (MapView) findViewById(R.id.mapView);
00054                 mapView.setBuiltInZoomControls(true);
00055 
00056                 mapOverlays = mapView.getOverlays();
00057 
00058                 // Geopoint to place on map
00059                 geoPoint = new GeoPoint(
00060                                 (int) (Double.parseDouble(user_latitude) * 1E6),
00061                                 (int) (Double.parseDouble(user_longitude) * 1E6));
00062 
00063                 // Drawable marker icon
00064                 Drawable drawable_user = this.getResources().getDrawable(
00065                                 R.drawable.mark_red);
00066 
00067                 itemizedOverlay = new AddItemizedOverlay(drawable_user, this);
00068 
00069                 // Map overlay item
00070                 overlayitem = new OverlayItem(geoPoint, "Your Location", "That is you!");
00071 
00072                 itemizedOverlay.addOverlay(overlayitem);
00073 
00074                 mapOverlays.add(itemizedOverlay);
00075                 itemizedOverlay.populateNow();
00076 
00077                 // Drawable marker icon
00078                 Drawable drawable = this.getResources().getDrawable(
00079                                 R.drawable.mark_blue);
00080 
00081                 itemizedOverlay = new AddItemizedOverlay(drawable, this);
00082 
00083                 mc = mapView.getController();
00084 
00085                 // These values are used to get map boundary area
00086                 // The area where you can see all the markers on screen
00087                 int minLat = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
00088                 int minLong = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
00089                 int maxLat = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
00090                 int maxLong = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
00091 
00092                 // check for null in case it is null
00093                 if (nearPlaces.results != null) {
00094                         // loop through all the places
00095                         for (Place place : nearPlaces.results) {
00096                                 latitude = place.geometry.location.lat; // latitude
00097                                 longitude = place.geometry.location.lng; // longitude
00098 
00099                                 // Geopoint to place on map
00100                                 geoPoint = new GeoPoint((int) (latitude * 1E6),
00101                                                 (int) (longitude * 1E6));
00102 
00103                                 // Map overlay item
00104                                 overlayitem = new OverlayItem(geoPoint, place.name,
00105                                                 place.vicinity);
00106 
00107                                 itemizedOverlay.addOverlay(overlayitem);
00108 
00109                                 // calculating map boundary area
00110                                 minLat = (int) Math.min(geoPoint.getLatitudeE6(), minLat);
00111                                 minLong = (int) Math.min(geoPoint.getLongitudeE6(), minLong);
00112                                 maxLat = (int) Math.max(geoPoint.getLatitudeE6(), maxLat);
00113                                 maxLong = (int) Math.max(geoPoint.getLongitudeE6(), maxLong);
00114                         }
00115                         mapOverlays.add(itemizedOverlay);
00116 
00117                         // showing all overlay items
00118                         itemizedOverlay.populateNow();
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 // Adjusting the zoom level so that you can see all the markers on map
00122                 mapView.getController().zoomToSpan(Math.abs(minLat - maxLat),
00123                                 Math.abs(minLong - maxLong));
00124 
00125                 // Showing the center of the map
00126                 mc.animateTo(new GeoPoint((maxLat + minLat) / 2,
00127                                 (maxLong + minLong) / 2));
00128                 mapView.postInvalidate();
00129 
00130         }
00131 
00132         @Override
00133         protected boolean isRouteDisplayed() {
00134                 return false;
00135         }
00136 
00137 }
